highlights.title: AN ICON REIMAGINED
highlights.content: True to its heritage roots and signature lines, the 2021 Forum is updated with a new low cut for the modern generation.

highlights.title: TIMELESS STYLE
highlights.content: A narrow toe cut puts a modern, stylish spin on this iconic shoe.

description.title: THE B-BALL STATUS SHOE IN LOW TOP FORM.
description.content: More than just a shoe, it's a statement. The adidas Forum hit the scene in '84 and gained major love on both the hardwood and in the music biz. This pair of the classic shoes brings back the '80s attitude, the explosive hardwood energy and the iconic X-strap ankle design, distilled into a low top version meant for the streets.

comments.color: Cloud White / Cloud White / Cloud white
comments.title: So stylish and comfortable!
comments.comment: The sizing is perfect, get the size you usually get with adidas.

comments.color: Cloud White / Cloud White / Core Black
comments.title: Best classics
comments.comment: The sizing is perfect, get the size you usually get with adidas.

comments.title: Good shoe
comments.comment: I use to be about the Superstar, but these are way more comfortable especially since I dance alot (Salsa). Dance shoes have been hard on my feet, and they've been alot better for my feet in combination with massage therapy. There's a bit of traction so turns arent really recommended in these.
